text: Juan José Lucas Giménez (born 10 May 1944) is a Spanish attorney, professor and politician. He is a member of the People's Party.Quién es quién: sus señorías los diputados Manuel Ángel Menéndez Gijón, Manuel Ángel Menéndez, Ignacio Fontes – 2002 Page 468 Lucas Jiménez, Juan José. Burgo de Osma (Soria), 10.5.1944. Casado con María Dolores López . Lucas was born in Burgo de Osma, Soria, Spain. In 2002, he was elected to the Senate of Spain. Before, he was a member of the Congress of Deputies from 1986 to 1987 and again from 1989 to 1991. From 2002 to 2004, Lucas was the President of the Senate of Spain. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Senate of Spain Category:Spanish lawyers
title: Juan José Lucas
